body: This was hot! I loved the twist ending.

@SanMig From that ending, I don't think she's blackmailing! I think she plans on handing it over to her husband who will do the rest! (I think that was the main plan, she might have known Kyouko is starving for sex while planning her revenge and brought up her husband COUNTING on her attempting to approach him for Sex, seeing they have a "S&M" relationship and his behavior! It's clear she ordered him to have sex with her if Kyouko askes him and take a picture afterwards). Also it's hentai, I've seen NTR where the girl COULD use her status and money, but instead falls for the old "I got pictures" game and has sex with NO guarantee he'll get rid of it nor deals with him when he makes NEW ones he wouldn't be able to make if I don't know "SHE DIDN'T FUCK HIM! It's called "Idiot Ball for the sake of plot!" and yes it is a terrible method to use!
@LordCellofEarth9 blackmail is useless if kyouko knows how to use her cash machine
Seems like she really underestimated missus whisper tits. lmao
no T-pose, no dominence... Title lied to me
How is she gonna be ugly and falt chested

@LoveLightning The issue is Kyouko sure didn't mind insulting the "plain woman" alongside trying to get said woman's husband to cheat with her cause her's wasn't satisfyingly her! Looking at what the other woman said at the end and the start! Kyouko isn't so innocent before that either! There really isn't such a thing a "sympathetic cheating" in that YEAH her husband is an ass, but he isn't wrong that she's dependent on him and if she didn't like it, she can leave. She really set herself up for that blackmail by doing it with another woman's husband and it was painfully obvious it was a trap (even if not, cheating was seriously stupid anyway), but she got overconfident so time to suffer the consequences!
Kyouko doesn't deserve this blackmail this is sad. faves anyway
That twist at the end made me favorite it lmao

I could only laugh at the end in how she got played LOL! Story had a good set up (not just problems with her husband, but also setting up how she'll get ruined by the other guy's wife because her husband pretty much made it clear to us the reader that he will NOT take her infidelity well if exposed!) Good art, sex was good and the set up and twist was well done! I rarely give praise to non-"Three Letter Word" Cheating Stories!
